detaileddescription.para: Defines the relation: The stream S is opened on the file F in mode M It might be used to obtain all open streams (by backtracking) or to access the stream for a file F in mode M, or to find properties for a stream S Notice that some streams might not be associated to a file: in this case YAP tries to return the file number If that is not available, YAP unifies F with S
